channel.title: Need help With portforwarding!
channel.description: Need help I cant use my own ip on www.ipchiken.com TO LOGIN server it just works on hAMACHIE NETWORK .. i know something kalled portforwarding but dont know wat it does or how works please post here if you know answer dont flame.

item.title: Need help With portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @jay689 jay689
item.description:
@jay689 wrote:

ok, you need to port forward, ill give you this way, i think its the best easiest and quickest way, so u cant get so many problems with it. if it dont work lemme know and ill find a different way

ok, to port forward, the easiest and from my point of view the best way to do it would be for you to download utorront, just get anyversion i guess cant see the version mattering, then install it, go into

  1. Options
    then
  2. go into preferances
    then
  3. Make sure yours is the SAME as mine
  4. once done exit it, then in the bottem right corner of the SCREEN nere the time find u torront, rigt clik, then exit

[TO SEE PICTURE CLICK ON THE THUMBNAIL AND IT WILL GO BIG. THEN MAKE YOURS THE SAME AS MINE]

Then Youre Done, Reply To This Post To Get Into Touch.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help With portforwarding!
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Should’ve used search first, but i reccomend searching “howto portforward” / something on the lines of this.

Also, ‘Need Help :O’ (As suggested in your subject name) Isn’t much of a title.
Change it to ‘Need IP Help’ or something like that, and you’ll get less ignorance. MoparScapers with brains like to help the people out with half a brain.
Not no brain atall.

Read full topic
